preconditions.precondition: The User clicks a button in the UI.

mainSequence.step: User clicks the button to trigger the operation.
The DirectoriesFiles component triggers the operation.
DirFileView handles the operation by calling DirFileService.
DirFileService calls DirFileHandler to handle the operation.
DirFileHandler creates or deletes directories or files based on the operation type.
DirFileService returns the outcome to DirFileView.
DirFileView updates the UI with the operation result.
The DirectoriesFiles component shows a notification to the User.
